Inheritance Cube: Immunizing Reversal/Basic Reversal

cubeImmunizingReversalMF.Rd

This function creates an Immunizing Reversal construct, it has 5 alleles at 1 locus

  • W: Wild-type

  • H: Homing allele

  • E: Eraser allele

  • R: No-cost resistance allele

  • B: Detrimental resistance allele

cubeImmunizingReversalMF(cHWM = 1, cHWF = 1, cEWM = 1, cEWF = 1,
  cEHM = 1, cEHF = 1, chHWM = 0, chHWF = 0, crHWM = 0,
  crHWF = 0, ceEWM = 0, ceEWF = 0, crEWM = 0, crEWF = 0,
  ceEHM = 0, ceEHF = 0, crEHM = 0, crEHF = 0, dHW = 0, dEW = 0,
  dEH = 0, dhHW = 0, drHW = 0, deEW = 0, drEW = 0, deEH = 0,
  drEH = 0, eta = NULL, phi = NULL, omega = NULL, xiF = NULL,
  xiM = NULL, s = NULL)

Arguments

cHWM

Cutting efficiency of H into W in males
cHWF

Cutting efficiency of H into W in females
cEWM

Cutting efficiency of E into W in males
cEWF

Cutting efficiency of E into W in females
cEHM

Cutting efficiency of E into H in males
cEHF

Cutting efficiency of E into H in females
chHWM

Homing efficiency of H into W in males
chHWF

Homing efficiency of H into W in females
crHWM

Resistance efficiency of H into W in males
crHWF

Resistance efficiency of H into W in females
ceEWM

Homing efficiency of E into W in males
ceEWF

Homing efficiency of E into W in females
crEWM

Resistance efficiency of E into W in males
crEWF

Resistance efficiency of E into W in females
ceEHM

Homing efficiency of E into H in males
ceEHF

Homing efficiency of E into H in females
crEHM

Resistance efficiency of E into H in males
crEHF

Resistance efficiency of E into H in females
dHW

Deposition cutting efficiency of H into W
dEW

Deposition cutting efficiency of E in to W
dEH

Deposition cutting efficiency of E into H
dhHW

Deposition homing efficiency of H into W
drHW

Deposition resistance efficiency of H into W
deEW

Deposition homing efficiency of E into W
drEW

Deposition resistance efficiency of E into W
deEH

Deposition homing efficiency of E into H
drEH

Deposition resistance efficiency of E into H
eta

Genotype-specific mating fitness
phi

Genotype-specific sex ratio at emergence
omega

Genotype-specific multiplicative modifier of adult mortality
xiF

Genotype-specific female pupatory success
xiM

Genotype-specific male pupatory success
s

Genotype-specific fractional reduction(increase) in fertility

Value

Named list containing the inheritance cube, transition matrix, genotypes, wild-type allele, and all genotype-specific parameters.

Details

This is the general form for an immunizing reversal drive. If the EW terms are 0, then this simplifies to a basic reversal drive.This drive handles different male and female homing rates, and female deposition from each allele, signifying differential expression from an autosome.

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details
